en: She sang her sweet song with feeling.
zh: 她充满感情地唱着她甜美的歌。

en: As she sang with all her heart, the audience was deeply moved.
zh: 当她全心全意地唱歌时，观众深受感动。

en: She tried hard to clear her mind of doubts.
zh: 她努力消除心中的疑虑。

en: She put out the light before she went to bed.
zh: 她上床睡觉前关了灯。

en: She used to pray before going to bed.
zh: 她过去常常在睡觉前祈祷。

en: She slept off her hangover.
zh: 她睡着了，解了酒。

en: She had gone to bed.
zh: 她已经上床睡觉了。

en: She is a reliable person.
zh: 她是一个可靠的人。

en: She is someone you can trust.
zh: 她是一个你可以信任的人。

en: She has a ring whose value is beyond belief.
zh: 她有一个价值令人难以置信的戒指。

en: She spread dishes on the table.
zh: 她在桌子上摆放餐具。

en: She removed the dishes from the table.
zh: 她把餐具从桌子上拿走了。

en: She is on a diet.
zh: 她在节食。

en: She ate her dinner.
zh: 她吃了她的晚餐。

en: She washed her dirty hands before the meal.
zh: 她在饭前洗了脏手。

en: She cleared away the dishes from the table.
zh: 她把桌子上的餐具收拾干净了。

en: She didn't mind doing the dishes.
zh: 她不介意洗碗。

en: She went out to buy some food.
zh: 她出去买些食物。

en: She is very particular about her food.
zh: 她对食物非常讲究。

en: She is particular about food.
zh: 她对食物很讲究。

en: She kept on talking while eating.
zh: 她一边吃东西一边不停地说话。

en: She has fair skin and hair.
zh: 她有白皙的皮肤和头发。

en: She has a fair complexion.
zh: 她肤色白皙。

en: She grows many kinds of flowers.
zh: 她种了很多种花。

en: She knows how to use her good looks to get what she wants out of men.
zh: 她知道如何利用她的美貌从男人那里得到她想要的东西。

en: She is dark-skinned.
zh: 她皮肤黝黑。

en: She was dismissed for loafing on the job.
zh: 她因工作偷懒而被解雇了。

en: She is connected with the Oda's by marriage.
zh: 她通过婚姻与织田家有联系。

en: She put new soil in the flower pot.
zh: 她在花盆里放了新土。

en: She wore a plain blue dress.
zh: 她穿着一件朴素的蓝色连衣裙。

en: It took her a while to realize the situation.
zh: 她过了一会儿才意识到情况。

en: She will have it that the conditions are unfair.
zh: 她认为这些条件是不公平的。

en: She gave me advice as well as information.
zh: 她给了我建议和信息。

en: She is able to grasp the situation.
zh: 她能够掌握情况。

en: She is easily moved to emotion.
zh: 她很容易被感动。

en: She is accessible to pity.
zh: 她很容易被同情。
